app.title: Kaitātari Pūkenga Oranga ā-Rā
app.subtitle: Aroturuki i tō motuhake ki ngā mahi o ia rā

start.disclaimer: Ko tēnei taputapu hei āwhina i a koe ki te aroturuki i ō pūkenga mahi ā-rā. Ehara tēnei i te taputapu tātari hauora. Me kōrero tonu ki ngā tohunga hauora mō ngā tohutohu hauora.
start.privacy: Kei te tiakina haumaru ō raraunga i runga i te pūtirotiro o tō pūrere, ā, ka mukua ina muku e koe ō raraunga pūtirotiro. Mā te whakamahi i tēnei taputapu, e whakaae ana koe ki ā mātou Ngā Kaupapa Ratonga me te Ngā Kaupapa Here Matatapu.

home.trackActivities: Aroturuki i ō pūkenga oranga ā-rā
home.viewHistory: Tirohia te Hītori me ngā Ia
home.viewDetails: Tirohia ngā Kaute o Nāianei mā te Wāhanga
home.aboutDescription: Ko tēnei kaitātari hei āwhina i a koe ki te aroturuki i ō pūkenga ki te mahi i ngā mahi nui e waru o ia rā:

disclaimerPoints.notDiagnostic: KĀORE tēnei i te taputapu tātari, ā, kāore e taea te whakakapinga i te aromatawai hauora ngaio.
disclaimerPoints.earlyAwareness: Kua hoahoatia mō te mōhiotanga moata me te aroturuki, ā, me kōrero ngā hua ki ngā kaiwhakarato hauora.
disclaimerPoints.familyObservation: He nui ake te painga ina whakamahia tahi me ngā tiro a te whānau/hoa.

assessment.selectOption: Kōwhiria te kōwhiringa e tino whakamārama pai ana i tō pūkenga o nāianei

questions.1: Ka taea te rapu me te waea i ngā nama waea, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te waea i ētahi nama e mōhiotia ana
questions.3: Ka taea te whakautu waea engari kāore e waea atu

questions.1: Ka taea te tiaki i ngā hiahia hoko katoa, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te hoko taonga iti, ko ia anake
questions.3: Me haere tahi i ngā haerenga hoko katoa
questions.4: Kāore rawa e taea te hoko

questions.1: Ka taea te whakamahere, te tunu, me te tuku kai tōtika, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te whakariterite kai tōtika mēnā kua tukuna ngā kai
questions.3: Ka taea te whakawerawera me te tuku kai kua oti te hanga
questions.4: Me whakariterite me te tuku te kai e ētahi atu

questions.1: Ka taea te tiaki i te whare ko ia anake me te āwhina wā anō mō ngā mahi taimaha
questions.2: Ka taea ngā mahi māmā o ia rā pērā i te horoi rihi, te whakatakoto moenga
questions.3: Ka taea ngā mahi māmā engari kāore e taea te pupuri i te paratanga e pai ana
questions.4: Me āwhina i ngā mahi tiaki whare katoa
questions.5: Kāore e whai wāhi ki ngā mahi tiaki whare

questions.1: Ka taea te horoi kākahu whaiaro katoa, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te horoi taonga iti pērā i ngā tōkena
questions.3: Me horoia ngā kākahu katoa e ētahi atu

questions.1: Ka haere motuhake i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui, ka taraiwa rānei i tōna ake waka
questions.2: Ka whakarite i ōna ake haerenga mā te tekihi
questions.3: Ka haere i runga i ngā waka tūmatanui me te āwhina
questions.4: Ko te haere he iti noa iho ki te tekihi, ki te waka rānei me te āwhina

questions.1: Ka taea te kawe haepapa mō te inu rongoā i te wā tika me te rahinga tika, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te kawe haepapa mēnā kua whakaritea te rongoā i mua
questions.3: Kāore e taea te whakahaere i ōna ake rongoā

questions.1: Ka taea te whakahaere i ngā take pūtea katoa, ko ia anake
questions.2: Ka taea te whakahaere i ngā hoko o ia rā engari me āwhina ki ngā mahi pēke
questions.3: Kāore e taea te whakahaere moni

results.title: Kua Oti te Aromatawai
results.subtitle: Koinei ō hua
results.highMessage: Kei te pai tō whakahaere i ngā mahi o ia rā. Haere tonu ki te aroturuki i ō pūkenga me te pupuri i ngā tikanga hauora pai.
results.moderateMessage: Ka hiahia pea ētahi mahi ki te tautoko. Whiriwhiria ngā wero ki ngā mema whānau, ki ngā kaiwhakarato hauora rānei.
results.supportMessage: He maha ngā mahi e whakaatu ana he āwhina e hiahiatia ana. Ka tūtohu mātou kia kōrero ki tētahi tohunga hauora mō ngā kōwhiringa tautoko.
results.viewHistory: Tirohia te Hītori me ngā Ia
results.nextStepsTitle: Me Aha Koe ā Muri Ake?

nextSteps.share: Tohaina ēnei hua ki ngā mema whānau, ki ngā kaitiaki rānei
nextSteps.track: Aroturuki i ngā rerekētanga i te wā e haere ana mā te aromatawai i ia wā
nextSteps.consult: Kōrero ki tētahi tohunga hauora mēnā ka kite koe i ngā hekenga e awangawanga ana
nextSteps.stayActive: Kia hohoro tonu te tinana, te hinengaro me te pāpori

history.title: Hītori Aromatawai
history.improvingMessage: Kei te whakapai ake ō kaute i te wā e haere ana
history.decliningMessage: Whiriwhiria tēnei ki te kaiwhakarato hauora
history.stableMessage: Kei te pūmau tonu ō kaute

details.title: Taipitopito Aromatawai
details.recommendationText: Whiriwhiria ngā kōwhiringa tautoko mō tēnei mahi ki ngā mema whānau, ki ngā kaiwhakarato hauora rānei.
details.aboutText1: Kei runga i te Lawton Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADL) Scale tēnei aromatawai, he taputapu kua whakamanahia e ngā tohunga hauora hei aromatawai i te motuhake whakahaere.
details.aboutText2: Ka āwhina ngā aromatawai auau i a koe ki te aroturuki i ngā rerekētanga i te wā e haere ana. Mēnā ka kite koe i te hekenga i ngā wāhanga maha, whiriwhiria te whakarite hui ki tō kaiwhakarato hauora.
